li.label: Enable Necromancer Progression Effects
li.tooltip:
Gradually apply stat bonuses and need modifiers as necromancers progress through stages. This matches the lore descriptions - UnfamiliarWithDeath will actually reduce hunger/rest as its description claims.
Effects include: - Gradual pain resistance (5% -> 15% -> 25% -> immune) - Increasing toxic resistance - Temperature tolerance expansion - Consciousness and learning boosts - Psychic sensitivity increase - Movement and melee improvements - Reduced rest/food decay (vanilla needs) - Reduced bladder/thirst decay (DBH needs) - Increased hygiene decay (stench of death) - Accelerated aging (10% -> 20% -> 40% -> disabled) The body decays faster as it embraces death, until aging becomes irrelevant.
Requires game restart to take effect.
